House & Stable Upgrades
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): FAQ (Required Reading!): House & Stable Upgrades
By Lisa Shock on Friday, November 8, 2002 - 10:09 pm:

Here's a chart of house and stable upgrades, which I have gotten from a Japanese book. (I went through it all in 1997, so I have no firm recollections.) If anyone notes any differences between this and the US game, please let me know.

House
(Changes the House Appearance)
UpgradeCostBreeder RankTotal Inventory Slots
Start of Game--8
1st2000G2nd10
2nd4000G3rd12
3rd8000G4th14
4th12000G6th16


Stable
(opens more slots in inventory)
UpgradeCostBreeder Rank
1st2500G2
2nd12000G6th


These events might happen after you reach higher ranks, if you do not have enough money for the upgrade at the time the game is set to do the upgrade.
